name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">counter1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="184">If the NBT number equals 10, it will strike lightning.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">MOD</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_num_get"><value name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_potion"><field name="potion">JUMP_BOOST</field><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">6</field></block></value><value name="duration"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">9000</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">fill ~10 ~10 ~10 ~-10 ~ ~-10 air</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="explode"><field name="mode">BREAK</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">30</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="set_time"><value name="time"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">15000</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="set_time"><value name="time"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1000</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
